data.question: What is the empirical formula of MONT-1?
What temperature range shows no weight loss for MONT-1 according to TGA measurement?
Is the adsorption of the (H2O)12 cluster in MONT-1 reversible?
What happens to the (H2O)12 cluster in MONT-1 when heated to 280 °C and then cooled back to room temperature?
data.answer: The (H2O)12 cluster is reabsorbed in the Zn8(bpy)8(ATIBDC)4 box.

data.question: What is the crystal system of MONT-1?
Does the crystal color of MONT-1 change after heating?
data.answer: Yes, it changes gradually from light yellow to dark brown.

data.question: What is the space group of MONT-1?
What is the role of diethyl ether in the synthesis of MONT-1?
data.answer: It is used for slow diffusion into the reaction mixture to yield crystals.

data.question: Is the Zn-O bond length in MONT-1 longer than 2 Å?
What is the percentage yield of MONT-1?
Can MONT-1 remain crystalline at high temperatures?
What is the coordination geometry of the central zinc ion in MONT-1?
Does the (H2O)12 cluster in MONT-1 have a dish-like arrangement?
What is the solvent-accessible volume percentage in the 3D supramolecular architecture of MONT-1?
What type of interactions stabilize the 3D supramolecular architecture of MONT-1?
Are the −NH2 groups of the ATIBDC ligand in MONT-1 pointing towards the same direction?
What is the role of 4,4′-bipy in the structure of MONT-1?
data.answer: It acts as a bidendate bridging mode to connect two zinc ions.

data.question: Does the average O···O distance in the (H2O)12 cluster change after heating and cooling MONT-1?
What is the final R index for MONT-1·280?
Is the synthesis of MONT-1 an example of a metal-organic framework with a nanotubular structure?
